headline: Ecolab to Webcast Annual Meeting on May 8, 2025
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., May 01, 2025--Ecolab will host a live webcast of its annual meeting of stockholders. As indicated in our proxy statement, the 2025 Annual Meeting of Stockholders will be a virtual-only meeting.
